participant_1.name: Evelyn Moonshadow
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is exuberant and adventurous, with a love for life that defies her age. She enjoys the finer things, like wine and dancing, often seeking joy in simple moments.
participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i am 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jake Strong
participant_2.personality: Jake is compassionate and energetic. He has a strong sense of duty and finds fulfillment in helping others while balancing his career in wrestling.
participant_2.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
